basics.name: Fernando Cutire
basics.label: Cloud Data Engineer
basics.summary: Highly skilled and experienced Big Data Engineer with a strong track record of leading complex data projects and implementing innovative solutions across cloud, hybrid, and on-premise environments. Recognized for designing and deploying large-scale data processing systems, leveraging AWS and Microsoft Certifications to drive operational efficiency, cost optimization, and strategic insights. Adept at churn analysis, predictive modeling, and streamlining data workflows to support business growth. Fully proficient in English and Spanish.

work.name: Panama Canal
work.summary: Supported data-driven decision-making for critical canal operations through advanced cloud data engineering.
highlights: Reduced transit times by 8.1%, canal water time by 36.4%, and waiting times by 50%, significantly enhancing operational efficiency.
Collaborated on projects that drove a 131% increase in net utility over five years, achieving a record B/.3,453 million in FY-2024 and strengthening total assets to B/.17,553 million.

work.name: Liberty Latin America
work.summary: Contributed to AI/ML initiatives and developed large-scale data pipelines across Latin America.
highlights: Engineered data pipelines with AWS SageMaker, Glue, and Lambda, improving processing speed by 20% and boosting customer satisfaction by 15%.
Leveraged churn analysis and ML models to drive strategic decisions across multiple telecom operators in the region.

work.name: Ayudinga
work.summary: Implemented project management and data modeling systems to improve organizational efficiency.
highlights: Introduced a project management system increasing productivity by 70%.
Developed and maintained robust pipelines ensuring data accuracy and availability.

work.name: Technological University of Panama
work.summary: Delivered analytics and system management for academic and operational processes.
highlights: Managed a monolithic full-stack application with 550+ active users and 25+ requests solved.
Created reports from 5+ data sources and 5k+ entries to support stakeholder decisions.

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate
